chats.Message: Hello! Welcome to your first day as a storage engineer
Do you need a rundown of your role here?
chats.Question: true

chats.Message: Of course you do, its your first day
You can drag any windows on the screen.
Your job is to move files as they arive to their free storage devices.
File arrive in the green File Transfer Area window. Do not let it fill up.
You need to drag and drop files and folders onto free drives.
Ensure you aren't running a security scan on the drive before moving it.!
Make sure you have enough space on the drive!
Follow all procedures in the rules document
